forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with gusty winds developing during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and becoming windy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with evening showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with evening showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
